George Floyd’s death sparks voices on America’s deep pain and searing rage Link: https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2020-06-05/george-floyds-death-sparks-voices-on-americas-deep-pain-and-searing-rage

Long-held assumptions and presumptions about public life in the U.S. are now part of long-overdue daily discourse: about race and justice, the reach of law enforcement and accountability.
